sen.j: 山岡 景宗（やまおか かげむね）は、戦国時代 (日本)から江戸時代前期にかけての武将。
sen.e: Kagemune YAMAOKA was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the Sengoku period and the early Edo period.
Kagemune YAMAOKA was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the Sengoku period and the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Kagemune YAMAOKA was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the Sengoku period and the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 織田信長の家臣・山岡景隆の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: He was the first son born to Kagetaka YAMAOKA, who was a vassal of Nobunaga ODA.
He was born as the first son of Kagetaka YAMAOKA, the vassal of Nobunaga ODA.
sen.cmt: was born as the first son of、, the vassal ofの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: He was born as the first son of Kagetaka YAMAOKA, the vassal of Nobunaga ODA.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: はじめ父と共に信長に仕え、天正4年（1576年）には松永久秀と共に石山本願寺攻めに参加している。
sen.e: At first he served Nobunaga together with his father, and he joined the siege of the Ishiyama Hongan-ji Temple with Hisahide MATSUNAGA in 1576.
He served Nobunaga with his father, and later joined the siege of the Ishiyama Hongan-ji Temple with Hisahide MATSUNAGA in 1576.
sen.cmt: 文の流れを自然にするため、一部修正しました。
sen.e: He served Nobunaga with his father, and later joined the siege of the Ishiyama Hongan-ji Temple with Hisahide MATSUNAGA in 1576.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 信長の死後、父・景隆は羽柴秀吉（豊臣秀吉）と敵対して改易され、まもなく死去した。
sen.e: After the death of Nobunaga, his father, Kagetaka, was deprived of his fief as he opposed Hideyoshi HASHIBA (Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI), shortly after which he died.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: After the death of Nobunaga, Kagemune's father, Kagetaka was punished by dismissal and deprivation of his position, privileges and properties for opposing Hideyoshi HASHIBA (Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI), and died shortly after.
sen.cmt: 文の流れを自然にするため、全体を修正しました。改易は用語データベースに合わせ、修正しました。
sen.e: After the death of Nobunaga, Kagemune's father, Kagetaka was punished by dismissal and deprivation of his position, privileges and properties for opposing Hideyoshi HASHIBA (Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI), and died shortly after.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: しかし景宗は秀吉から許されて1450石の所領を与えられ、馬廻の1人に列せられた。
sen.e: However, Kagemune was pardoned by Hideyoshi, and was given a fief worth 1,450 koku as one of Hideyoshi's Oumamawari (horse guards).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: However, Kagemune was pardoned by Hideyoshi, was given 1,450 koku (approximately 261,000 liter of crop yields), and became one of Hideyoshi's Oumamawari (horse guards).
sen.cmt: kokuは説明を加えた方が良いと思います。１koku=約180literとして計算しています。文の流れを自然にするため、一部修正しました。
sen.e: However, Kagemune was pardoned by Hideyoshi, was given 1,450 koku (approximately 261,000 liter of crop yields), and became one of Hideyoshi's Oumamawari (horse guards).
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 朝鮮出兵では秀吉に従い、肥前国名護屋城に在陣した。
sen.e: At the time of Hideyoshi's Invasion of Korea, he followed Hideyoshi and set up a camp at Nagoya-jo Castle in Higo Province.
When Hideyoshi invated Korea, Kagemune followed Hideyoshi and set up camp at Nagoya-jo Castle in Higo Province.
sen.cmt: set up campです。文の流れを自然にするため、一部修正しました。
sen.e: When Hideyoshi invated Korea, Kagemune followed Hideyoshi and set up camp at Nagoya-jo Castle in Higo Province.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 秀吉の死後は豊臣秀頼に仕え、大坂の役でも豊臣方として戦った。
sen.e: After the death of Hideyoshi, he served Hideyori TOYOTOMI and joined the Toyotomi army during the Siege of Osaka.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: After the death of Hideyoshi, he served Hideyori TOYOTOMI and joined the Toyotomi army during the Siege of Osaka.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: After the death of Hideyoshi, he served Hideyori TOYOTOMI and joined the Toyotomi army during the Siege of Osaka.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: しかし戦後は罪を許されて徳川家康、徳川秀忠らに仕えて本領を安堵されている。
sen.e: However, he was pardoned by Ieyasu TOKUGAWA, and he was guaranteed of his main fief.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: However, he was pardoned after the war, served Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and Hidetada TOKUGAWA, and was approved the ownership of his inherited estate.
sen.cmt: 戦後、徳川秀忠が訳もれです。「本領を安堵されている」は、用語集を参考に、修正しました。
sen.e: However, he was pardoned after the war, served Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and Hidetada TOKUGAWA, and was approved the ownership of his inherited estate.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
